text: The Frisco Railroad 1500/T-54 Class 4-8-2 was a class of 30 American Steam Locomotives built for the Frisco Railroad between 1923 and 1926 . These locomotives were numbered 1500-1529 and all 30 locomotives pulled passenger trains and freight trains in America . One locomotive number 1503 was semi streamlined until it was scrapped . They even would have been pulling military troop transport trains to the ports of southern America during World War 2 . They were retired and scrapped in the 1950â€™s . 6 locomotives were preserved and rest were scrapped.
title: Frisco Railroad 1500 Class 4-8-2
